title: Software Engineer
responsibility: Design and implement software applications using Java and Python.
job_description: We are looking for a talented software engineer to join our team and help us build the next generation of Facebook products.
educational_description: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.

title: Data Analyst
responsibility: Analyze large sets of data to identify trends and patterns that will help inform business decisions.
job_description: We are seeking a data analyst to join our team and help us optimize our operations through data-driven decision-making.
educational_description: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or related field.

title: Product Manager
responsibility: Develop and execute a product roadmap to meet business objectives and drive user engagement.
job_description: We are looking for a skilled product manager to join our team and help us bring innovative products to market.
educational_description: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Business, or related field.

title: Backend Developer
experience: 3+ years of experience with backend development
job_description: We are seeking a highly skilled backend developer to join our team at Tesla. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining the backend systems that power our electric vehicles and energy products.
educational_description: Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Machine Learning Engineer
responsibility: Develop and deploy machine learning models
experience: 5+ years of experience in machine learning
job_description: Netflix is looking for a highly skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and deploying machine learning models that help us personalize and improve our customer experience.
educational_description: Master's or PhD in Computer Science or related field

title: Frontend Developer
experience: 3+ years of experience with frontend development
job_description: Airbnb is looking for a highly skilled frontend developer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining the frontend applications that power our platform and help millions of people find unique places to stay and experiences to enjoy.
educational_description: Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related field
